title: End of the Line
name: EndWin
description: The weathered ROV creaks to a stop in front of a large clearing. The weary crew opens the ROV's hatches and glances outward. Before them lies the tattered remains of huge parachutes and the worn but intact hulls of the enormous cargo crates, guided from outer space to this very spot months before Exomer751's arrival. They've made it... RX-2020.

title: Notice
name: PanelBreak
description: The crew’s solar panels have been badly damaged and is no longer capable of restoring energy. The crew can travel until the remaining batteries’ energy reaches 0. Luckily the group has the spare parts to fix the broken subsystem. It might be wise if they stop and fix it before the power runs dry.

title: Notice
name: LastStorage
description: The crew uses the last of their spare parts to repair the badly damaged storage. While at first storage space might sound like an inconsequential issue an a vehicle the size of the ROV, but the space required to house supplies for a crew the size of the Exomer crew quickly adds up. The ROV's specialized storage compartments allow the crew to store supplies well beyond the capabilities of an average storage container, but at the cost of specialized parts, that are very hard to come by on a planet supplied only by the occasional space wreck. Chances to find a wreck are slim and the chances to find these spare parts are even slimmer, but it may be wise to search for spare storage parts to avoid a supply catastrophe.

title: Notice
name: NoEnergy
description: As the batteries reach 0% the internal displays flicker off, their electronic buzz fades away, and the ROV glides quietly to a rest.

title: Notice
name: LastTrack
description: The crew used the last of their spare parts to fix the broken tracks. If the tracks break again, they will be unable to travel and will be forced to camp. It might be a good idea to search for spare track parts before that happens.

title: Notice
name: StorageBreak
description: The crew’s storage has been badly damaged. Unable travel without losing all their supplies, they are forced to make camp to make emergency repairs to the storage subsystem. Luckily, the crew has enough spare bits and pieces to restore the storage’s functionality.

title: Notice
name: LastBattery
description: The crew strings together the last batteries they have. Fortunately they are able to transfer the existing energy from the remaining batteries into the new ones without any power loss. Without any spare batteries, the crew risk losing all their power and becoming immobile. It might be wise to search for spare battery parts before then.

title: Notice
name: NoTrack
description: The tracks are broken. The crew tries to scrape together enough parts to piece them back together, but it just isn't enough. Unable to repair the tracks, their last hope lies in the slim chance of searching for spare track parts that may be nestled in a nearby wreckage.

title: Notice
name: LastEnergy
description: Only 5% of the batteries power remains. When the energy reaches 0%, the ROV's subsystems will be shutdown and the crew may not have the resources to restart and recharge the batteries. If possible, it may be a good idea to charge the batteries now.

title: Notice
name: TrackBreak
description: The crew’s tracks has been badly damaged. Unable travel, they are forced to make camp to perform emergency repairs. Luckily, the crew has enough spare bits and pieces to restore the tracks to working order.

title: Notice
name: LastPanel
description: The crew has used up all its spare solar panel parts, if something happens to their last solar panel they won't be able to charge the batteries anymore. It might be a good idea to search for more solar panel parts before it's too late.

title: Notice
name: NoBattery
description: The batteries have broken and the ROV's control panel grows dark. The crew's last hope lies in the slim chance of finding spare batteries in a nearby wreckage. With limited ammo, they load their weapons and prepare for the journey.

title: Notice
name: BatteryBreak
description: The crew’s batteries have been badly damaged. Unwilling to risk losing all their existing power stores, they are forced to make camp to perform emergency repairs to the battery subsystem. Luckily, the crew has enough spare bits and pieces to complete the necessary fixes.
